name: Weird Is Normal ~Delivery~
description:
Johnson is in the middle of a frustrating raid with people that apparently never had played anything other than Tetris before. He needs something with a lot of cheese and ham: pizza.
But surely the whole raid would fall apart entirely the second he leaves, so how does he get his pizza instead? Maybe he knows someone that may be of help?
But will they help willingly?

With music from Kevin McLeod

.

Other WIN games:

Weird Is Normal ~Fateful~
